$interpreted: Feiz: Your Majesty, we've arrived at the entrance of the Academy.
Feiz: Based on the student's report, the traitor Elio and his henchmen are hiding here.
Feiz: Please, be cautious and pay attention to your safety.
Angelia: I'm aware. That's precisely why I called on General Feiz and the troops to come here so urgently.
Naya: So what are we going to do next?
Naya: Just command the troops to bust in there?
Angelia: No, not unless it's absolutely necessary. I don't want to declare war against the Academy.
Angelia: We'll discuss the matter first. Perhaps the Academy has some grievances and they're not purposefully harboring Elio.
Angelia: I only invited the army along for self-protection, and...
Angelia: ...and to threaten them...
Naya: Angel...
Tica: Get outta the way! Get outta the way!
Naya: That girl looks familiar...wait a sec, isn't that Tica?
Tica: Going left!
Tica: Now right!
Tica: Slow down! Not that way!
Feiz: Damn it, it's an ambush! Your Majesty, back up!
Tica: W-W-W-W-Wait, you're gonna hit Tica!
Tica: ２.0, stop! STOPPP!
Angelia: Tica, are you trying to attack us?
Tica: Eh?
Tica: Oooo, it's Her Majesty the Queen and Officer Naya〜
Tica: Why are you here...
Tica: ——Waaaaaahh!
Feiz: I-I-I'm useless...Rosset, take Her Majesty and leave, quickly!
Tica: I'm sorry, it wasn't on purpose!
Angelia: Please tell me what's going on, Tica. Otherwise, I'll take this as a declaration of war by the Rune Academy.
Tica: Declaration of war!?
Tica: Nonononono, 2.0's out of control! I'm tryin' ta control it...
Feiz: Your Majesty, watch out! It's attacking!
Tica: Guardian 2.0, stop it! If you don't listen, I'm turning you off!
Tica: Eh? Can't turn it off!? You're kiddin' me, there's no external energy supply!
Tica: Li-Hwa!
Li-Hwa: Headmaster Charle wanted me to come help you, but this is looking pretty tricky...
Tica: Ya. I mean, I already pulled out its energy source! If we don't stop it, the Queen's gonna think the Academy's declaring war on her!
Li-Hwa: Tica, you told me before that even though you're a student of Applied Magic, you have some knowledge of Life Magic.
Li-Hwa: You must know that the two schools of thought are not congruent, so why study both?
Tica: Eh? Why you asking that all of a sudden? Shouldn't we stop 2.0's next attack?
Li-Hwa: No time to explain. What's your response?
Tica: Uhhh〜I never thought about it too much. Just study what I want to. Isn't being limited by a school of thought super boring?
Tica: Plus, after studying 'em both, I found that a lot of their principles are interchangeable〜
Li-Hwa: I wasn't mistaken. You're the right choice.
Li-Hwa: Tica, listen.
Li-Hwa: I'm going to find a way to cut off its Qi energy, you attack when the time is right.
Tica: Eh!? Qi!?
Tica: It's been turned off...
Tica: Li-Hwa is freaking boss〜what kind of technique is this?
Li-Hwa: This is not a rune. It is what Professor Morris and them were missing during the Rune Guardian experiment.
Tica: ...Uh...a bit deep, wouldn't you say?
Li-Hwa: All things are comprised of Soul Energy, if cutting off external energy does not stop its movements, then it must be internal energy that is in motion.
Li-Hwa: ——That is "Qi Energy".
Tica: Ah, what you just said!
Tica: No no no, the Rune Guardian was made with runes.
Tica: Qi energy is what the Beasts of the East Alliance use, and the Beasts can't use runes...
Li-Hwa: That's what Professor Morris and the rest thought. That's why no matter what they tried, they were unable to successfully power the Rune Guardian.
Li-Hwa: Because no one thought that the missing piece wasn't to be found in the rune system, but in the Qi energy of the Beasts.
Tica: B-B-B-B-B-But...
Li-Hwa: Why so surprised?
Li-Hwa: Didn't you just say so yourself?
Li-Hwa: —— "a lot of their principles are interchangeable〜"
Tica: Are you saying that the human's runes and the Beasts' Qi could be compatible!?
Angelia: ...Pardon the interruption.
Angelia: As for this attack, I am aware that it was not on purpose.
Angelia: I'd also like to find the Headmaster. Could you report something to him for me?
Tica: Oh, yeah, the Headmaster's injury!
Tica: It's not looking good! You came at the perfect time, please save the Rune Academy!

Model.Text: Your Majesty, we've arrived at the entrance of the Academy.
Based on the student's report, the traitor Elio and his henchmen are hiding here.
Please, be cautious and pay attention to your safety.
I'm aware. That's precisely why I called on General Feiz and the troops to come here so urgently.
So what are we going to do next?
Just command the troops to bust in there?
No, not unless it's absolutely necessary. I don't want to declare war against the Academy.
We'll discuss the matter first. Perhaps the Academy has some grievances and they're not purposefully harboring Elio.
I only invited the army along for self-protection, and...
...and to threaten them...
Angel...
Get outta the way! Get outta the way!
That girl looks familiar...wait a sec, isn't that Tica?
Going left!
Now right!
Slow down! Not that way!
Damn it, it's an ambush! Your Majesty, back up!
W-W-W-W-Wait, you're gonna hit Tica!
２.0, stop! STOPPP!
Tica, are you trying to attack us?
Eh?
Oooo, it's Her Majesty the Queen and Officer Naya〜
Why are you here...
——Waaaaaahh!
I-I-I'm useless...Rosset, take Her Majesty and leave, quickly!
I'm sorry, it wasn't on purpose!
Please tell me what's going on, Tica. Otherwise, I'll take this as a declaration of war by the Rune Academy.
Declaration of war!?
Nonononono, 2.0's out of control! I'm tryin' ta control it...
Your Majesty, watch out! It's attacking!
Guardian 2.0, stop it! If you don't listen, I'm turning you off!
Eh? Can't turn it off!? You're kiddin' me, there's no external energy supply!
Li-Hwa!
Headmaster Charle wanted me to come help you, but this is looking pretty tricky...
Ya. I mean, I already pulled out its energy source! If we don't stop it, the Queen's gonna think the Academy's declaring war on her!
Tica, you told me before that even though you're a student of Applied Magic, you have some knowledge of Life Magic.
You must know that the two schools of thought are not congruent, so why study both?
Eh? Why you asking that all of a sudden? Shouldn't we stop 2.0's next attack?
No time to explain. What's your response?
Uhhh〜I never thought about it too much. Just study what I want to. Isn't being limited by a school of thought super boring?
Plus, after studying 'em both, I found that a lot of their principles are interchangeable〜
I wasn't mistaken. You're the right choice.
Tica, listen.
I'm going to find a way to cut off its Qi energy, you attack when the time is right.
Eh!? Qi!?
It's been turned off...
Li-Hwa is freaking boss〜what kind of technique is this?
This is not a rune. It is what Professor Morris and them were missing during the Rune Guardian experiment.
...Uh...a bit deep, wouldn't you say?
All things are comprised of Soul Energy, if cutting off external energy does not stop its movements, then it must be internal energy that is in motion.
——That is "Qi Energy".
Ah, what you just said!
No no no, the Rune Guardian was made with runes.
Qi energy is what the Beasts of the East Alliance use, and the Beasts can't use runes...
That's what Professor Morris and the rest thought. That's why no matter what they tried, they were unable to successfully power the Rune Guardian.
Because no one thought that the missing piece wasn't to be found in the rune system, but in the Qi energy of the Beasts.
B-B-B-B-B-But...
Why so surprised?
Didn't you just say so yourself?
—— "a lot of their principles are interchangeable〜"
Are you saying that the human's runes and the Beasts' Qi could be compatible!?
...Pardon the interruption.
As for this attack, I am aware that it was not on purpose.
I'd also like to find the Headmaster. Could you report something to him for me?
Oh, yeah, the Headmaster's injury!
It's not looking good! You came at the perfect time, please save the Rune Academy!
